entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
